message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your position on the price, but $15,000 is already a significant discount on the value this product will bring you.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
